creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: 3/4 view of an old woman looking down to R; white bonnet covering head, down shoulders, to white collar
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until November 16, 1985; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: signed in plate at bottom margin: [M. Plonski f. No. 1]
title: Head of an Old Woman
